website_summaries.verdict: Vivid color and exceptional sound for such a low price point. Ideal for those who want a larger TV or monitor screen without all the weight or advanced smart technology.
pros: TV is very lightweight, easy to mount and set up
Compatible with PCs for monitor use
cons: Repairs and replacements can be challenging
Reports of screen damage on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Jut Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: So my 50" led went out. I'm pretty sure I diagnosed a power board. The cheapest I could get a new board was $114. This was $199, so it was a no brainer. I don't buy high end tvs, not my thing, so I can't compare to a $800 tv. But this looks and sounds terrific. Easy to assemble and set up. Plenty of inputs too!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstein Howell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV for the price. No it's not a smart TV.
customer_reviews.text: You aren't going to be able to see peach fuzz in someone's butt crack across your yard while you are watching football this season, however at this price point it provides excellent quality for your buck. In my instance, I wanted a new larger TV to replace the one I had in my living room and I didn't want to spend 2k on a curve.
customer_reviews.author: MindFire Computer Services

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price so far exceeds my expectations !
customer_reviews.text: Living room replacement TV It was easy to set up - i did it alone and i'm a 50 yr old disabled woman . At first i was not sure the cable seemed a little static on the picture but i went into the settings and hooked up my Roku and what a beautiful picture - I watched the Twilight Saga on it and I never have seen Edward sparkle so! it was simple and I Love it ! .... people complained on the reviews but the sound is fine to me and the picture is great - Just get one !
customer_reviews.author: CSD

customer_reviews.title: great deal!
customer_reviews.text: so as soon as i got the tv i had to make sure it’s not broken or had any screen issues as i’ve seen in previous reviews! everything looks fine and the image is pretty good! it’s an amazing deal for the price!! i’ll keep a lookout for any issues and will definitely do an update here if anything shows up! update 9/3/18 : had it for three weeks and my family uses it almost every day! the quality isn’t the best however it’s still super good for the price and so far no screen issues or any other type of problems.
customer_reviews.author: nancyf

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this purchase! I received free shipping, it shipped fast, they shipped it to Alaska via Fed Ex, and no damage occurred during shipping!! The TV was just as described, the picture is great, and I am just amazed that I got a 50" TV shipped to Alaska for under 200 dollars! Absolutely no complaints and I would do it again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price! Three HDMI inputs.
customer_reviews.text: Picture looks great well and beyond $200 with the refresh rate of 120 that’s gaming and for better picture. Pictures a little dark just play with it though in settings. the TV is sensitive when touch. Some people are bitching about only been 60 Refresh rate. The TV only Excepts the system or cable box puts out 60 or 120 most people don’t know that . But I used to have a tv for $5-6 hundred ,This tv is better. But I’m detecting a promblom A flash blue screen only Appears for like a split second but only happens every great once in a while, that not related to the computer, I have hooked up to It!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S

customer_reviews.title: it's not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Don't tell me it is what I pay for. Horrible. Seriously. Pay $100 more and get a real tv. This is like a toy that is made for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Besides the packaging all around 7/10 product!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand all the bad reviews this TV has gotten. It's wonderful, the picture quality is out of this world for something this priced, it's a large cheap 50" TV. It's light weight, I put the whole thing together myself, the picture if awesome for what it is, the colours are vibrant and not washed out. The sound may be sub par, but connect any other sound system to it and it's fabulous. I connected my fire TV and ps4 and have absolutely no complaints, great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This TV is well worth the price of $225 and a little more.👍.
customer_reviews.text: My Sceptre 50" Class FHD (1080P) LED TV (X505BV-FSR) I purchased was at an amazing price. This TV has a nice weight to it may require two people to help bring it in and set it up for me it did. Very pleased with the size of the television as well as the picture and the easy programming of the 50" Sceptre the user guide is very easy to follow along with great pictures to guide you through this set up process. What was surprising is that you have so many options of audio video equipment like the USB Flash Drive, Headphone, and Computer that can be connected to this Television and more.
customer_reviews.author: ☺👍Very Happy Customer!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price! The color on some of the cable channels can sometimes look saturated in a kind of greenish blue hue. Not sure if it is cable box because fire stick and ps4 both look just fine.so honestly can't really complain! Surround sound hooked up (Samsung) with no issues. Oh, the remote can be a little stubborn sometimes (like multiple presses to turn on or switch input) other than that pretty happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: The price is right
customer_reviews.text: It's an inexpensive TV without bells and whistles but the picture is quite good. Get a media player and you're good to go. No bad pixels and still going strong after a few months of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Picture is very dark can't do much with the setting..
customer_reviews.text: I used the tv in the living room, size is ok is working ok, but when it comes to the picture that where the problem is tv picture is too dark no matter how i set it up if i set it for clearer picture Does not look good i know i got what i pay for but for next time I'll buy a better one not to happy with this one but for the budget is fine I'll see if i decide to keep it. I'll keep in touch....?after playing with the setting for a while i been able to fix the picture better i guess im keeping this tv for that price won't find a better one .....
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget TV
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this tv based on the price point. I usually purchase LG or Vizio, but I didn’t want to spend a lot of money for a room that wouldn’t get tons of use. I am glad I purchased this tv. The picture quality is pretty good- is it 4K? No, but it’s crisp enough for a $200 tv. It was also light enough for me to hang on the wall by myself. Comes with a screwdriver to add/remove feet which was a nice extra.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value, screen quality good, sound so so
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price! Needed a new TV for the basement where the kids play so purchased this one. Setup was easy and the packaging was well done. The picture is just fine for the basement but the sound is pretty weak. I’ll just grab a sound bar if needed in the future. I definitely recommend this TV and glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Najduk

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived in perfect condition.. initial tests good.. time will tell durability but Spectre TV quality must have improved because older internet reviews had me concerned while waiting for this purchase to arrive.. I say buy it
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great price for such large TV
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy this size of a TV but I love it!! I’ve had it for almost 6months and no issues. Certain movies I watch the sound isn’t all that good but I will buy a sound bar or surround sound system but it’s nothing major. I would recommend and great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: For the money!!!!! The Best
customer_reviews.text: Biggest TV I could get for the money. I couldn't believe how sharp for the price. I thought I would be disappointed but holy smokes. GET THIS TV!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Coolest Cutter At Camp

customer_reviews.title: ah-mazing!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty rare I don't hear from my boyfriend, about how he "could've found better". But this TV impressed him! It's been a few weeks and he's still commenting how great it is despite the low price.
customer_reviews.author: brady @ fresh face skin studio

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered this from Walmart for the same price and it came damaged. I returned it and decided to give Amazon a try. They delivered it within a couple days and it was free from damage. Hooked it up right away and fell in love. Great picture and sounds good. I bought it for my boyfriend to use for video games so he's not asking me to use mine. I would recommend this purchase to anyone who needs an affordable, nice TV. Hoping it lasts awhile, but did by an extended warranty if Sceptre fails me.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Componets
customer_reviews.text: I dislike, honestly just bought, don't know if this happened to another purchaser but see I have a brand new Roku and plugged it into HDMI 1, it worked fine. When I adding another component like AV port or another HDMI 2 like my Xbox to the Sceptre. I went back to my Roku and it started glitching and flickering. For a new TV, this is a problem. But hey unplug the Roku and plug it in. Let it restart and as long as you don't change the Input, It doesn't glitch..hmm
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: NOT ONE COMPLAINT
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to replace 32" in Garage. $200 or so,.... perfect. wanted a 60", But this is perfect. on a slanted shelf I Once had a 100 # + 37" Sony Tube TV. That was Like Cool when I had that 15 years ago.... This is Like WOW !! I splurged $130 on a Vizio Sound bar and I can Rock the block...... Hell that was less than Half of the Money I saved "Setteling" for the Sceptere. Very Satisfied ! Ill try to add a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Victor S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that amazon delivered it right to my door with no hassle.
customer_reviews.text: This Tv is just what you should expect for your money the quality is not good the picture is not vibrant color and it’s slow to come on, I kept the Tv because i needed to replace a tv that I dropped that was for a spare room in my house that I rarely use a tv in .so it’s just a tv that I don’t use very often so it’s ok for what spent for it
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tv at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tv at a great price! I am an avid gamer and tv/movie watcher. I have had absolutely no problems with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Niles

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that you're getting a 50 inch screen for next to nothing. Is is anywhere in the league as it's high dollar peers? Nope. Did you pay the same amount for it? Also nope. There is absolutely nothing remarkable about this TV. 1080p is ok. Picture is ok. Plenty of inputs. As others have mentioned, the sound is dubious, but I can live with it. If sound quality is important to you, pair it with a sound bar. For it's price, I have absolutely nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Massner

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a good price, but that’s about all it has going for it. There is a sort of shadow at the corners of the screen all the time. The speakers aren’t very good, and there is a dead pixel in the middle of the screen. Next time I would spend a little more and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first Sceptre 5 years ago and it's still going strong . Since then have bought 3 more, 2 as gifts and most recently a 50" for myself. Great picture, the sound is alright but since I wear headphones most of the time it really doesn't matter. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dewar

customer_reviews.title: Great tv! Super happy with this find!
customer_reviews.text: We were pretty surprised with the quality of the tv. We were expecting “you get what you paid for.” In this case I think we got way more than we paid for. Very happy with this tv and for $199?!! We ended up buying a second one for our daughters room.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Garza

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: for the price its pretty good the sound is not all of that..could be a little better but a sound bar may help the quality. Only con is the legs are kinda weak not that sturdy but if you plan on mounting it then its not an issue..The pic quality is good after you adjust it..but I'm satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: angelicashields

customer_reviews.title: I strongly suggest you don't purchase this TV
customer_reviews.text: Well you get what you pay for you get a 50 inch TV with no sound
customer_reviews.author: Larry P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this TV for over two years and it has been amazing. The picture and sound quality are great and have never faded over time. We use a Roku streaming stick with it and it’s just like having a smart TV. We absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tv for the price and it looks great mounted on my loving room wall!! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Picture mode was stuck
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the tv out of a mode that was intermittent and sluggish on the screen. When trying to reset it, it continued to stay the same. Going to return the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Trick206

customer_reviews.title: Family movie nit
customer_reviews.text: I donated this item to a family of 5. Single mom 4 boys. The cost was very reasonable. They enjoy family movie nite. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great TV for $$
customer_reviews.text: first one the tuner was gone, so have a replacement. This one is great, except I do not get very many channels on my antenna, but do get the ones I use the most. Roku and movies are great. For the money, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie W

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: You pretty much get what you pay for! Not a bad thing! I bought it for my kids playroom and they enjoy it! I wouldn’t mount it as my dens centerpiece but honestly was what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stansill

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tv with caution because of the price. The tv lasted exactly 3 months. After 3 months tv went completely white screen and was unable ro watch. Buyer beware. Do not buy b
customer_reviews.author: Yaritza Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Beware Volume Is Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is terrible. Speakers must not be great. If you have a problem hearing. This TV is not the right choice. Picture is nice. So if you dont like hearing your TV, then its a good buy for you. Disapointing buy.
customer_reviews.author: On the Road again

customer_reviews.title: No Breakage, in tact.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase, color is ok but could be crisper and yes I've tried to adjust. It's light weight and easy to set up. Packaging was great, nothing broke and the screen was not cracked. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for the price! The picture quality is awesome! The sound is something totally different! I am on 100 24/7!!!! The sound quality is bad, you will need to purchase additional speakers, but with the price it is still a great deal! I Plan to order two more with surround sound speakers as well!
customer_reviews.author: broker

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I kept thinking that I should pay a bit more money and get a "brand" name tv. Ultimately I couldn't resist the 199 price. After a few tweaks to the settings, the picture is outstanding. My purchase was further justified when a went to a local store, and saw a much more expensive 50 inch, and I truly thought my picture looked better. TV aficionados can probably tell the difference, but I'm sure its marginal...great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Raio

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $200
customer_reviews.text: For $200 this tv is a winner!! Very lightweight. Great picture. Only bad part is the audio isn’t great but can be easily fixed with either a sound bar or even a self system stereo. Have had mine since August & still no complaints. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: STEVE909

customer_reviews.title: dead on arival
customer_reviews.text: first TV arrived dead, replacement TV dead as well. I will not try a third
customer_reviews.author: Edward Kraus

customer_reviews.title: TV good. Remote not so much!
customer_reviews.text: I like the TV very much. Sound and picture are very good...definitely a good deal. However, I do have an issue with the remote...it eats batteries! I have to remove them from the unit every evening to avoid having dead ones! Very frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: DLL

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This Tv has worked great for me for about 2 years and I suspect it will be working great for years to come. It was a great price and I couldn't be happier with it. I use it every day and I still have to had to replace the batteries in the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My mom Absolutely loves her television it has a good picture good sound good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, sounds good, havemt used voice commands really but cool tv
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful TV
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tv. Ok this tv is heavier than many of the new TV's. However is has better sound than most of the lower priced TV's. It is not a smart TV but for not to much you can get a roku and have a great set up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Vikki McConachie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for over a year now and it's still running good. The sound is a bit muffled in larger rooms (living room) but it's not too bad in my bedroom. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: craps out after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: after 3 months not moving from its place the tv picture is flickering it wont be long before the whole thing goes do yourself a favor and spend an extra hundred
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV and it's getting some bad reviews. For the person that posted it's not a 50 inch.. Well just so you know, whenever you are measuring a screen it's to be measured diagonally not left to right🤔 So people please do your homework before commenting 🤘
customer_reviews.author: Omar Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great picture.
customer_reviews.text: I love sceptre and element tv's they have better quality than most brands I've owned. The picture is great but the audio is a bit poor still works perfectly just not loud enough but I'd expect that with every slim framed tv panel. I appreciate the low price for these tv's it seems to me that these 2 companies care about what others can afford thank you for not over pricing your tv's keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Far apart stands, but perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Has served me well for over a year with no issues, no dead pixels etc. Bear in mind the stands are very far apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves it. Says its the best birthday gift She can even use the rwmote without messing up the settings. This is a good thing as I live 800 miles away and talking her through input and setting changes over the phone can be difficult on the best days
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay, you cant beat this deal. Great TV. You may find yourself wanting a sound bar also as the TV gets loud but during some movies not so much as others. Also the legs are very small, though I've had no problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: To get the best sound you must be it in closed area
customer_reviews.author: AKA ali

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price point. Picture is clear, refresh rate will leave some ghosting when watching High Def or BluRay movies.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Vengley

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect when I purchased this brand that I had never heard of. Well, after setting it up I couldn't believe how good it looks. Works great with my outdoor antenna and works great with my Hulu via a Roku stick. If you are looking for a cheap TV that works perfect, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Tellez

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this TV is excellent. There is some backlight inconsistencies however they are easily overlooked because the picture, with some tweaking of picture settings, is flawless 1080. Arrived in new, working, undamaged packing material condition.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Iseberg

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. Just a straight up tv with good 1080p quality. Out of the box everything seems to work perfectly. Screen looks great, no complaints at all. This is an incredible value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for  Basic TV
customer_reviews.text: We use it in the office to show the weather, but the TV does work well as a basic monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J. Trask

customer_reviews.title: awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: This tv is awesome! As. good if not better then the samsung i had which dird after 4 years. we love this tv!
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Still works 3 months later. Looks as good as my lg same size
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: There isn’t a better buy for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Sceptre computer monitors for over a decade. I’m comfortable with the brand and ended up impressed with the TV as well. I love the value at $199 and love it even more that it has no smart TV features integrated. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: David Frendo

customer_reviews.title: Quality of picture/sound etc
customer_reviews.text: This item was so much more than expected. Shopping was super easy...details were perfect. Shipping was fast and inexpensive. Item arrived in mint condition
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We've had the Sceptre TV for about a week and we love it. Everyone that sees it remarks how beautiful the picture is and how clear. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sis

customer_reviews.title: Screen
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd TV from Amazon and now after 2 months I have vertical lines. Now I have to get in touch with sceptre.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Don't 2nd guess it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely well worth what was paid,easy assembly and easier to navigate. Excellent quality picture and sound,overall very satisfied. A++
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.1323

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv as a gift when opened, the tv did not work, because this was gift it was opened after the return window I was unable to get tech support or ability to exchange. I would not purchase from this company or type of tv again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and screen for the money. I previously purchased a tv that was way smaller for $100 more, so it is a great deal. No issues with shipping. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get when you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's okay my brother bought the 55 inch and it's like they were made by different manufacturers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 weeks old
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy. 2 weeks old and the screen went black. It is going to be a week for a replacement. Seems like 2 day shipping would be more their answer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice picture, and a great value! If your looking for the 4K, this isn’t the TV for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Mullen

customer_reviews.title: sets on the patio for viewing..
customer_reviews.text: for the money this is a excellent tv.. now lets see how long it last..
customer_reviews.author: Lou66

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ! I love it . Price was great ! Buy it
customer_reviews.author: Mocha Superior

customer_reviews.title: Incedible for the incredible price!
customer_reviews.text: I am still amazed every time I turn it on. For the price and quality, unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Nucifora

customer_reviews.title: Descent tv, I'm not HD ready
customer_reviews.text: Good for the cost. Not best but good enough for me
customer_reviews.author: K. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: What a steal for the price.. fantastic TV, great picture and quality.. really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Hissem

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for your money. Is perfect price and the quality beautiful. So happy with tv.
customer_reviews.author: Rex T

customer_reviews.title: UPS is not good with electronics.
customer_reviews.text: UPS was very rough the box had holes in it and the driver dropped the box when taking off the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought about 8 of these for my business. Solid TVs, especially for the price. My go-to for my upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal here
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of poor reviews. I took a chance and my TV works great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, Low price
customer_reviews.text: We've had this TV for 1 month and from day 1 it has been excellent. Deep, clear, vibrant colors and excellent picture quality. We do not do gaming but we have our fire stick and blue ray player hooked into it.
customer_reviews.author: Ladystitch

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture for the price. Not sure how long it will last but definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: tracey nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this T.V for my dads birthday and i was so surprised at the Quality that the tv offers the picture quality is amazingly outstanding so that's why gave a it 5-star rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: It’s important that you have the right screws for the wall mount because my first day getting it I broke one of the holes out the back of the tv. Other than that, I’m completed satisfied and I wouldn’t mind buying another for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Tremell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap brand name brand picture
customer_reviews.text: Speakers aren't great but picture is amazing! For 200$ it's a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Michael  C

customer_reviews.title: It's a good price for 55inch TV
customer_reviews.text: I like the price of the TV I appreciate thank u
customer_reviews.author: Monica J.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a smart tv, but really nice
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my laptop and PlayStation instead of watching tv. So if you just need a big screen this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian V.

customer_reviews.title: The audio was horrible, picture quality very good.
customer_reviews.text: The TV is very good for $200.00 Excellent picture quality, the audio is not very good external speakers can be used ,very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: delivery was terrible
customer_reviews.text: the box was wet when it arrived and fed-ex just threw it on my porch. but the tv seems to be fine and works great
customer_reviews.author: Quantana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture-horrible sound
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, but it might as well come without speakers as they are truly horrible.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rainwater

customer_reviews.title: sceptre 50 inch tv flickering
customer_reviews.text: horrible quality tv DO NOT BUY FLICKING AND THE TV ONLY HAS 6 MONTH ALMOST NEVER USE IT BAD SUPPORT
customer_reviews.author: Juan Zheng

customer_reviews.title: If you want a better quality picture buy a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.text: For the money it it ok The picture quality is not all that but it serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dorrette

customer_reviews.title: Love it....
customer_reviews.text: Great value.... works very well and have no issues with the picture or the sound. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.text: From box to video. 5 minutes. Impressed with quality of picture and audio. For the price 5stars
customer_reviews.author: lam253

customer_reviews.title: Menu board
customer_reviews.text: Got this for work as a digital menu board. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The tv is great no problems with it. I will say you should buy a sound bar with it. Most all flat screen TVs have poor quality speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny T.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Great I wish on the delivery aspect they could have at least rang the door bell
customer_reviews.author: malik jones

customer_reviews.title: The sound is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset because the sound on the tv is horrible! You barely can hear the sounds or the people speaking on the cable tv. You turns it all the way up and still can’t get it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But it again
customer_reviews.text: The tv’s volume is a little weak but the picture quality is great. Best deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Frank

product_meta.title: Sceptre 50" Class FHD (1080P) LED TV (X505BV-FSR)
product_meta.description: With X505BV-FSR, razor-sharp clarity and dazzling color unfolds right before your eyes. Clear QAM tuner is included to make cable connection as easy as possible, without an antenna. From battle scenes to car chases, MEMC 120 will smoothly deliver almost twice as many frames as 60Hz. HDMI input delivers the unbeatable combination of high-definition video and clear audio. A USB port comes in handy when you want to flip through all of your stored pictures and tune into your stored music. More possibilities: with HDMI, VGA, Component and Composite inputs, we offer a convenient balance between the old and new to suit your diverse preferences.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories
